name: Meteor Maniac
description:
Meteor Maniac is a Rouge-Like set in space made for the 2nd BTP Game Jam where you play as a meteor.

Controls:

Left click = Shoot
Right click = Change gravity
Space = Jump
A = Move Left / Counter Clock Wise
D = Move Right / Clock Wise
E = Pick up weapon
Escape = Pause
T = Spawn Boss
